title: How many sentences is a 250 word essay? - Quora

response.answer_text: A typical good sentence is word up of 12 words. So around 25 sentences for the 250 word essay. Use a tool like Accurate Word counter, word count, WPM counter, character counter, character count, letter counter to type in your essay, it counts words as you type in.
In 250 words, you will most likely have 3-4 paragraphs in total, each with 50-100 words. This will allow for 3-5 concise but detailed sentences per paragraph.
